snippet: The cellist David Finckel and the pianist Wu Han retreat to a large Manhattan apartment when they are not touring.
abstract: Manhattan apartment of cellist David Finckel and his wife, pianist Wu Han, is refuge when they are not touring; Finckel welcomed the fixer-upper aspect of home when they were shown property, even though his wife was initially unconvinced.
lead_paragraph: The cellist David Finckel and the pianist Wu Han retreat to a large Manhattan apartment when they are not touring.

headline.seo: The Manhattan Apartment of David Finckel and Wu Han
headline.main: In Concert on the Home Front
headline.print_headline: In Concert on the Home Front
